testcase.name: User registers by successfully completing the registration form
testcase.system-out: Given a web browser is at the Hepsiburada home page.........................passed When the user click dropdown................................................passed And user clicks on the registration item....................................passed Then user sees the registration form........................................passed And user enters the name....................................................passed And user enters the surname.................................................passed And user enters the email...................................................passed And user enters password....................................................passed And user click the agreement checkbox.......................................passed And user click submit button................................................passed And driver close............................................................passed
